index 000000000..f588b4fbf
import os
import sys
import subprocess
import shutil

def main():
print("Setting up docs directory...")

# remove if needed
if os.path.exists("test_docs"):
shutil.rmtree("test_docs")

os.mkdir("test_docs")

with open("test_docs/conf.py", "w") as f:
f.write('project = "mypackage"\n')
f.write('author = "me"\n')
f.write('version = "0.1.0"\n')
f.write('release = "0.1.0"\n')
f.write('language = "en"\n')
f.write('extensions = []\n')
f.write('html_theme = "alabaster"\n')
f.write('rst_prolog = """\n.. |psf| replace:: Python Software Foundation\n"""\n')

with open("test_docs/index.rst", "w") as f:
f.write('Welcome\n')
f.write('=======\n\n')
f.write('.. toctree::\n\n')
f.write('   mypackage\n')

with open("test_docs/mypackage.rst", "w") as f:
f.write(':mod:`mypackage2`\n')
f.write('=================\n\n')
f.write('Content\n\n')
f.write('Subheading\n')
f.write('----------\n')

print("Running sphinx-build...")
cmd = ["sphinx-build", "-b", "html", "test_docs", "test_docs/_build"]
try:
result = subprocess.run(cmd, capture_output=True, text=True)
print("sphinx-build output:")
print(result.stdout)
print("sphinx-build errors:")
print(result.stderr)
if result.returncode != 0:
print("sphinx-build returned non-zero exit code => FAIL")
sys.exit(1)
except Exception as e:
print(f"Failed to run sphinx-build: {e}")
sys.exit(1)

# Now let's see if "mypackage2" is in index.html
index_html_path = os.path.join("test_docs", "_build", "index.html")
if not os.path.exists(index_html_path):
print("index.html not found => FAIL")
sys.exit(1)

with open(index_html_path, "r") as f:
content = f.read()

if "mypackage2" in content:
print("Found 'mypackage2' in index.html => PASS => BUG FIXED => exit code 0")
sys.exit(0)
else:
print("Did not find 'mypackage2' in index.html => FAIL => BUG STILL PRESENT => exit code 1")
sys.exit(1)

if __name__ == "__main__":
main()
